questions.question: Who is the all-too-friendly next door neighbour?
What is the name of the Simpsons family's dog?
Who soot Mr. Burns in a famous two-part episode?
Who are the three main bullies (not counting Nelson)?
questions.answer: Jimbo, Kearney, and Dolph (or "James Jones", "Kevin Zzyzwicz", and "Darren Starbeam")

questions.question: Which toy, released by Kid First Industries, was programmed to attack other toys?
